long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are a Korean who speaks Japanese, you are tired of Korean's chinese characters(kanji hanzi hanja) and Japanese's chinese characters(kanji hanzi hanja).

The basic font of the system may be because it is different from Japanese Chinese characters(kanji hanzi hanja) using Korean Chinese characters(kanji hanzi hanja).

I want to see this Chinese character(kanji hanzi hanja) in Japanese!
Also, I don't want to see Korean ugly fonts (for example, 굴림, 돋움, 바탕, 궁서).

Change the font set by the website publisher.

You are attracted to the 'Noto Sans CJK JP' font.


******
Before use this addon you should install 'Noto Sans CJK JP' font on your system.
